attributes.action: Pressure Saudi Arabia to stop the the bombings in Yemen.
attributes.additional_details:
16 million (60%) Yemeni's lack clean water and basic sanitation, this has resulted in over one million people affected and over three thousand dead, the worst epidemic since records began.
the UN says "10 million Yemenis are one step away from famine". Tens of thousands have died and the people of Yemen need our help more than ever and we should use our political influence in the Middle East to stop this deadly, unjust and inhumane war.

sources: WHO, Human Rights Watch and the UN
attributes.background:
Yemen is entering it's 5th year of war with Saudi Arabia and it's coalition and the whole world has given it a blind eye, savage Saudi bombings have led to schools, shelters and hospitals being destroyed.
 
The British government can either be part of the solution or the problem.
